about.title: About ChongLuaDao.AI
about.paragraph1: ChongLuaDao.AI is an advanced technology platform using artificial intelligence to protect users from scam calls. We understand that phone scams are becoming a major threat in Vietnam, with thousands of people losing money each year.
about.paragraph2: With AI voice recognition technology and machine learning, we analyze call content, detect common scam patterns and assess risk levels to help you make safe decisions. Our goal is to create a protective shield for every Vietnamese user.

risks.title: Are you at risk?
risks.description: Phone scams are becoming a major threat in Vietnam. Every year, thousands of people lose money by believing in fake bank calls, prize notifications, or other tricks.
risks.risk1: Fake calls from "banks" requesting identity verification
risks.risk3: Requests for OTP codes or account passwords

features.title: Technology that protects you
features.description: Using artificial intelligence and machine learning to automatically analyze and detect scam patterns
features.feature1Desc: Advanced AI voice recognition technology converts calls to text with high accuracy, supporting multiple languages and Vietnamese dialects
features.feature2Desc: Deep analysis system identifies common scam tactics: bank impersonation, prize notification calls, requests for sensitive information
features.feature3Desc: ML algorithm calculates risk score from 0-100%, providing detailed warnings of suspicious signs to help you make safe decisions and protect your assets

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: Just 3 simple steps to protect you from scams
howItWorks.step1Desc: Upload call recordings or videos containing voice to be analyzed
howItWorks.step2Desc: System converts voice to text and scans for scam indicators
howItWorks.step3Desc: View transcript, risk score and warning list with specific explanations
